<script>
function sr_menus_setupMainNav_button_inline () {
    if (sr_detect_operaMini || !("classList" in document.createElement("_"))) {
	return false;
    }
    var nav_trigger = document.getElementById('nav_trigger');
    if(!nav_trigger || nav_trigger.triggered) {
	return false;
    }
    nav_trigger.triggered = true;
    var nav = document.getElementById('nav');
    var nav_trigger_a = nav_trigger.querySelector('a');
    if (nav_trigger_a) {
	nav_trigger_a.setAttribute('href','javascript:void(0)');
	nav_trigger.onclick = function (event) {
	    nav.classList.toggle('open');
	    var is_open = nav.classList.contains('open');
	    if (is_open) {
		nav_trigger.classList.add('open');
	    }
	    else {
		nav_trigger.classList.remove('open');
	    }
	    event.preventDefault();
	    try { sr_record_analytics_event('MainNavButtonClick_inline',sr_record_directory(),sr_record_page());}
	    catch(err) {}
	};
    }
    return true;
}
sr_menus_setupMainNav_button_inline();
</script><div class="search" role="search" aria-label="Site Search for players, teams and sections">

	<h1>
		<span>Joe Musgrove</span>
			</h1>
	
<p>
    <strong>Position:</strong>
    Pitcher
  
</p>

<p>
	<strong>Bats: </strong>Right
        &nbsp;•&nbsp;
	<strong>Throws: </strong>Right
    
</p>


<p><span>6-5</span>,&nbsp;<span>230lb</span>&nbsp;(196cm,&nbsp;104kg) </p>

  <p>
    <strong>Team:</strong>
    <a href="/teams/SDP/2024.shtml">San Diego Padres</a> (majors)
  </p>


<p>
  <strong><a href="/bio/">Born:</a></strong>
    <span id="necro-birth" data-birth="1992-12-04">
    <a href="/friv/birthdays.cgi?month=12&amp;day=4">December 4</a>, <a href="/leagues/majors/1992-births.shtml">1992</a>
    </span> <span><nobr>(Age:&nbsp;31-263d)</nobr></span>

    
  <span>
    
      in El Cajon, <a href="/bio/CA_born.shtml">CA</a>
    
  </span>
  <span class="f-i f-us" style="">us</span>
</p>






  <p><strong>Draft</strong>: Drafted by  the <a href="/draft/?team_ID=TOR&amp;year_ID=2011&amp;draft_type=junreg&amp;query_type=franch_year">Toronto Blue Jays</a> in the <a href="/draft/?year_ID=2011&amp;draft_round=1&amp;draft_type=junreg&amp;query_type=year_round">1st round</a> (46th) of the 2011 MLB June Amateur Draft  from <a href="/draft/?key_school=5b2824ff&amp;exact=1&amp;query_type=key_school">Grossmont HS (La Mesa, CA)</a>.</p>



  
    <p><strong>High School:</strong>        <a title="" href="/schools/index.cgi?key_school=5b2824ff">Grossmont HS (La Mesa, CA)</a></p>
  
  
  



  
  
  
    
   <p><strong><a href="/leagues/majors/2016-debuts.shtml">Debut:</a></strong>
    <a href="/tools/route.cgi?dest=debut&amp;id=musgrjo01&amp;game_id=HOU201608020">
    August 2, 2016
    </a>
    (Age 23-242d,
    21,209th in major league history)
    <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="/boxes/HOU/HOU201608020.shtml">vs. TOR</a> 4.1 IP, 1 H, 8 SO, 1 BB, 0 ER
    
  </p>


    



  <p>

  </p>

  </p>

<script>
// see sr.menus.js:sr_menus_checkInfoCookie to explain
function sr_menus_checkInfoCookie_inline(browserType) {
    var el_info = document.getElementById('info');
    var el_button = document.getElementById('meta_more_button');
    var bling_len = 1;    
    if (!el_button || !el_info || !el_info.classList) { console.log('no meta_button'); return; }
    var el = el_button;
    var siblingsHidden = 0;
    while (el = el.previousSibling) { if ((el.nodeType === 1) && (el.offsetWidth <= 0 || el.offsetHeight <= 0)) { siblingsHidden++; } }
    var button_cookie = false;
    if (browserType === 'desktop') {  button_cookie = vjs_readCookie('meta_more_button');   }
    // We allow up to four of bling lines or additional player bio data entries in mobile.
    if (el_info && el_button && (button_cookie || (siblingsHidden + bling_len <= 4))) {el_button.parentNode.removeChild(el_button);	el_info.classList.add('open');  }
    else { el_button.classList.add('show');  }
}
if (Modernizr.desktop || Modernizr.laptop) { sr_menus_checkInfoCookie_inline('desktop'); } else { sr_menus_checkInfoCookie_inline('mobile'); }
var sr_menus_checkInfoCookie_run_inline = true;
</script>

  <span class="section_anchor" id="2188716153_link" data-label="Season Totals"></span><h2></h2>

<div class="section_heading assoc_total" id="total_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="total_link" data-label="Season Totals"></span><h2>Season Totals</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul><li>Based on play-by-play. Some differences with official totals may exist.</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container" id="div_total">

         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats" >AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed" >2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed" >3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases" >SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing" >CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954." >SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>

     <div class="section_content" id="div_2188716153">
	    
<div id="all_total" class="table_wrapper">

<div class="section_heading assoc_total has_controls" id="total_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="total_link" data-label="Season Totals"></span><h2>Season Totals</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul><li>Based on play-by-play. Some differences with official totals may exist.</li>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_total">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_total" name="total" href="#total">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_total">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="total" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Season Totals</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>

  <span class="section_anchor" id="total_extra_link" data-label="Season Totals -- Game-Level"></span><h2>Season Totals -- Game-Level</h2>

  <span class="section_anchor" id="plato_link" data-label="Platoon Splits"></span><h2>Platoon Splits</h2>

      <ul>

<div class="table_container" id="div_plato">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table" id="plato" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Platoon Splits</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats" >AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed" >2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed" >3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases" >SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing" >CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954." >SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>

</table>


</div>
<div class="footer no_hide_long" id="tfooter_plato">

<strong>vs Starter</strong> batting splits are for the entire game when the starter was LH or RH.  These splits include any subsequent plate appearances against a reliever regardless of their throwing hand.  These splits are a proxy for platoon splits for seasons we lack play-by-play data. <strong>from GL</strong> team pitching splits indicate how batters did against the team and use the batter's overall batting handedness for this split.
</div>-->




<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_plato">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="plato" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Platoon Splits</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">vs RHB</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">141</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">124</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">15</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">37</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">7</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">7</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">2</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">11</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">28</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">2.55</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.298</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.383</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.524</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.907</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">65</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">8</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">6</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.337</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">114</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">156</td></tr>
<tr data-row="1"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">vs LHB</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">107</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">95</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">13</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">26</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">6</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">7</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">23</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">3.29</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.274</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.336</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.432</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.768</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">41</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SF">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.324</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">82</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">112</td></tr>

</tbody></table>


</div>
<div class="footer no_hide_long" id="tfooter_plato">

<strong>vs Starter</strong> batting splits are for the entire game when the starter was LH or RH.  These splits include any subsequent plate appearances against a reliever regardless of their throwing hand.  These splits are a proxy for platoon splits for seasons we lack play-by-play data. <strong>from GL</strong> team pitching splits indicate how batters did against the team and use the batter's overall batting handedness for this split.
</div></div>

      </thead>
<tbody><tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >Home</th><td class="right " data-stat="G" >8</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA" >173</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB" >158</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >22</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >43</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B" >10</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR" >9</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS" >4</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >8</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >37</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >4.63</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg" >.272</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc" >.335</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc" >.506</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" >.842</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB" >80</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP" >6</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >7</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip" >.304</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" >97</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" >137</td></tr>
<tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >Away</th><td class="right " data-stat="G" >4</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA" >75</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB" >61</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >11</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >20</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B" >3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR" >1</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >10</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >14</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >1.40</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg" >.328</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc" >.427</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc" >.426</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" >.853</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB" >26</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SF" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip" >.396</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" >106</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" >140</td></tr>

<div class="section_heading assoc_hmvis has_controls" id="hmvis_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="hmvis_link" data-label="Home or Away"></span><h2>Home or Away</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_hmvis">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_hmvis" name="hmvis" href="#hmvis">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>

<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_hmvis">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="hmvis" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Home or Away</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">Home</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">8</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">173</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">158</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">22</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">43</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">10</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">9</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS">4</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">8</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">37</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">4.63</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.272</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.335</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.506</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.842</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">80</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">6</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">7</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.304</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">97</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">137</td></tr>
<tr data-row="1"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">Away</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">4</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">75</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">61</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">11</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">20</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">10</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">14</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">1.40</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.328</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.427</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.426</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.853</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">26</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SF">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.396</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">106</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">140</td></tr>

<div id="all_hmvis_extra" class="table_wrapper">

<div class="section_heading assoc_hmvis_extra has_controls" id="hmvis_extra_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="hmvis_extra_link" data-label="Home or Away -- Game-Level"></span><h2>Home or Away -- Game-Level</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_hmvis_extra">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_hmvis_extra" name="hmvis_extra" href="#hmvis_extra">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_hmvis_extra">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="hmvis_extra" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Home or Away -- Game-Level</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Wins" data-stat="W" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wins">W</th>
         <th aria-label="Losses" data-stat="L" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Losses">L</th>
         <th aria-label="Win-Loss %" data-stat="win_loss_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Win-Loss Percentage</strong><br>W / (W + L)<br>For players, leaders need one decision for every ten team games.<br>For managers, minimum to qualify for leading is 320 games." data-filter="1" data-name="Win-Loss %">W-L%</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Run Average" data-stat="earned_run_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>9 * ER / IP</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>Bold indicates lowest ERA using current stats<br><span class=glimmer>Gold</span> means awarded ERA title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Earned Run Average">ERA</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Started" data-stat="GS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Started">GS</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Finished" data-stat="GF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Finished">GF</th>
         <th aria-label="Complete Games" data-stat="CG" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Complete Game">CG</th>

         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>

         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>

         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954." >SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>

<div class="section_heading assoc_half_extra" id="half_extra_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="half_extra_link" data-label="First or Second Half -- Game-Level"></span><h2>First or Second Half -- Game-Level</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      </ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container" id="div_half_extra">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table" id="half_extra" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>First or Second Half -- Game-Level</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Wins" data-stat="W" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wins" >W</th>
         <th aria-label="Losses" data-stat="L" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Losses" >L</th>
         <th aria-label="Win-Loss %" data-stat="win_loss_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Win-Loss Percentage&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;W / (W + L)&lt;br&gt;For players, leaders need one decision for every ten team games.&lt;br&gt;For managers, minimum to qualify for leading is 320 games." data-filter="1" data-name="Win-Loss %" >W-L%</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Run Average" data-stat="earned_run_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;9 * ER / IP&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates lowest ERA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=glimmer&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded ERA title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Earned Run Average" >ERA</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Started" data-stat="GS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Started" >GS</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Finished" data-stat="GF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Finished" >GF</th>
         <th aria-label="Complete Games" data-stat="CG" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Complete Game" >CG</th>
         <th aria-label="Shutouts" data-stat="SHO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Shutouts&lt;br&gt;No runs allowed and a complete game." >SHO</th>
         <th aria-label="Saves" data-stat="SV" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Saves" >SV</th>
         <th aria-label="Innings Pitched" data-stat="IP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Innings Pitched" data-filter="1" data-name="Innings Pitched" >IP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Runs" data-stat="ER" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Earned Runs Allowed" >ER</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Balks" data-stat="BK" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Balks" >BK</th>
         <th aria-label="Wild Pitches" data-stat="WP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wild Pitches" >WP</th>
         <th aria-label="Batters Faced" data-stat="batters_faced" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Batters Faced" >BF</th>
         <th aria-label="Walks &amp; Hits per IP" data-stat="whip" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(BB + H)/IP&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Walks &amp; Hits per IP" >WHIP</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts per 9 IP" data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;9 x SO / IP&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts per 9 IP" >SO9</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >1st Half</th><td class="right " data-stat="W" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="L" >4</td><td class="right " data-stat="win_loss_perc" >.429</td><td class="right " data-stat="earned_run_avg" >5.66</td><td class="right " data-stat="G" >10</td><td class="right " data-stat="GS" >10</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CG" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SHO" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SV" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="IP" >49.1</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >58</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >32</td><td class="right " data-stat="ER" >31</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR" >10</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >15</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >44</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >7</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="BK" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="WP" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batters_faced" >214</td><td class="right " data-stat="whip" >1.480</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine" >8.0</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >2.93</td></tr>
<tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >2nd Half</th><td class="right iz" data-stat="W" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="L" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="win_loss_perc" ></td><td class="right " data-stat="earned_run_avg" >1.04</td><td class="right " data-stat="G" >2</td><td class="right " data-stat="GS" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CG" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SHO" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SV" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="IP" >8.2</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >5</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >1</td><td class="right " data-stat="ER" >1</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HR" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >7</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="BK" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="WP" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batters_faced" >34</td><td class="right " data-stat="whip" >0.923</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine" >7.3</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >2.33</td></tr>

</table>

    </div>

     <div class="section_content" id="div_4475365245">
	    
<div id="all_half" class="table_wrapper">

<div class="section_heading assoc_half has_controls" id="half_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="half_link" data-label="First or Second Half"></span><h2>First or Second Half</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul><li>Determined by All-Star Break</li>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_half">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_half" name="half" href="#half">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_half">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="half" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>First or Second Half</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">1st Half</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">10</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">214</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">190</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">32</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">58</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">11</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">10</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">5</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS">4</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">15</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">44</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">2.93</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.305</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.374</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.521</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.895</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">99</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">8</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">7</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SF">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.348</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">111</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">151</td></tr>
<tr data-row="1"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">2nd Half</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">2</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">34</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">29</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">5</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HR">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">7</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">2.33</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.172</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.294</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.241</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.536</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">7</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.227</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">31</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">52</td></tr>
