<div class="section_heading assoc_half_extra has_controls" id="half_extra_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="half_extra_link" data-label="First or Second Half -- Game-Level"></span><h2>First or Second Half -- Game-Level</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_half_extra">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_half_extra" name="half_extra" href="#half_extra">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_half_extra">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="half_extra" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>First or Second Half -- Game-Level</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Wins" data-stat="W" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wins">W</th>
         <th aria-label="Losses" data-stat="L" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Losses">L</th>
         <th aria-label="Win-Loss %" data-stat="win_loss_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Win-Loss Percentage</strong><br>W / (W + L)<br>For players, leaders need one decision for every ten team games.<br>For managers, minimum to qualify for leading is 320 games." data-filter="1" data-name="Win-Loss %">W-L%</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Run Average" data-stat="earned_run_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>9 * ER / IP</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>Bold indicates lowest ERA using current stats<br><span class=glimmer>Gold</span> means awarded ERA title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Earned Run Average">ERA</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Started" data-stat="GS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Started">GS</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Finished" data-stat="GF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Finished">GF</th>
         <th aria-label="Complete Games" data-stat="CG" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Complete Game">CG</th>
         <th aria-label="Shutouts" data-stat="SHO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Shutouts<br>No runs allowed and a complete game.">SHO</th>
         <th aria-label="Saves" data-stat="SV" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Saves">SV</th>
         <th aria-label="Innings Pitched" data-stat="IP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Innings Pitched" data-filter="1" data-name="Innings Pitched">IP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Runs" data-stat="ER" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Earned Runs Allowed">ER</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Balks" data-stat="BK" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Balks">BK</th>
         <th aria-label="Wild Pitches" data-stat="WP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wild Pitches">WP</th>
         <th aria-label="Batters Faced" data-stat="batters_faced" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Batters Faced">BF</th>
         <th aria-label="Walks &amp; Hits per IP" data-stat="whip" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(BB + H)/IP</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Walks &amp; Hits per IP">WHIP</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts per 9 IP" data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>9 x SO / IP</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts per 9 IP">SO9</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">1st Half</th><td class="right " data-stat="W">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="L">4</td><td class="right " data-stat="win_loss_perc">.429</td><td class="right " data-stat="earned_run_avg">5.66</td><td class="right " data-stat="G">10</td><td class="right " data-stat="GS">10</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CG">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SHO">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SV">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="IP">49.1</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">58</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">32</td><td class="right " data-stat="ER">31</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">10</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">15</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">44</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">7</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="BK">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="WP">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batters_faced">214</td><td class="right " data-stat="whip">1.480</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine">8.0</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">2.93</td></tr>
<tr data-row="1"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">2nd Half</th><td class="right iz" data-stat="W">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="L">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="win_loss_perc"></td><td class="right " data-stat="earned_run_avg">1.04</td><td class="right " data-stat="G">2</td><td class="right " data-stat="GS">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CG">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SHO">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SV">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="IP">8.2</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">5</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="ER">1</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HR">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">7</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="BK">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="WP">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batters_faced">34</td><td class="right " data-stat="whip">0.923</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine">7.3</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">2.33</td></tr>

         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats" >AB</th>

         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>

         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>

  <span class="section_anchor" id="month_extra_link" data-label="Months -- Game-Level"></span><h2>Months -- Game-Level</h2>

<div class="table_container" id="div_month_extra">

    <caption>Months -- Game-Level</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Wins" data-stat="W" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wins" >W</th>
         <th aria-label="Losses" data-stat="L" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Losses" >L</th>
         <th aria-label="Win-Loss %" data-stat="win_loss_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Win-Loss Percentage&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;W / (W + L)&lt;br&gt;For players, leaders need one decision for every ten team games.&lt;br&gt;For managers, minimum to qualify for leading is 320 games." data-filter="1" data-name="Win-Loss %" >W-L%</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Run Average" data-stat="earned_run_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;9 * ER / IP&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates lowest ERA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=glimmer&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded ERA title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Earned Run Average" >ERA</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Started" data-stat="GS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Started" >GS</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Finished" data-stat="GF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Finished" >GF</th>
         <th aria-label="Complete Games" data-stat="CG" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Complete Game" >CG</th>
         <th aria-label="Shutouts" data-stat="SHO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Shutouts&lt;br&gt;No runs allowed and a complete game." >SHO</th>
         <th aria-label="Saves" data-stat="SV" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Saves" >SV</th>
         <th aria-label="Innings Pitched" data-stat="IP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Innings Pitched" data-filter="1" data-name="Innings Pitched" >IP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Runs" data-stat="ER" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Earned Runs Allowed" >ER</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Balks" data-stat="BK" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Balks" >BK</th>
         <th aria-label="Wild Pitches" data-stat="WP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wild Pitches" >WP</th>
         <th aria-label="Batters Faced" data-stat="batters_faced" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Batters Faced" >BF</th>
         <th aria-label="Walks &amp; Hits per IP" data-stat="whip" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(BB + H)/IP&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Walks &amp; Hits per IP" >WHIP</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts per 9 IP" data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;9 x SO / IP&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts per 9 IP" >SO9</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >April/March</th><td class="right " data-stat="W" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="L" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="win_loss_perc" >.500</td><td class="right " data-stat="earned_run_avg" >6.94</td><td class="right " data-stat="G" >7</td><td class="right " data-stat="GS" >7</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CG" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SHO" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SV" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="IP" >35.0</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >45</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >27</td><td class="right " data-stat="ER" >27</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR" >9</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >13</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >27</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >6</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="BK" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="WP" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batters_faced" >158</td><td class="right " data-stat="whip" >1.657</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine" >6.9</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >2.08</td></tr>
<tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >May</th><td class="right iz" data-stat="W" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="L" >1</td><td class="right " data-stat="win_loss_perc" >.000</td><td class="right " data-stat="earned_run_avg" >2.51</td><td class="right " data-stat="G" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="GS" >3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CG" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SHO" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SV" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="IP" >14.1</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >13</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >5</td><td class="right " data-stat="ER" >4</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR" >1</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >17</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >1</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="BK" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="WP" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batters_faced" >56</td><td class="right " data-stat="whip" >1.047</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine" >10.7</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >8.50</td></tr>

    </div>
-->
     <div class="section_content" id="div_9512322167">
	    
<div id="all_month" class="table_wrapper">

<div class="section_heading assoc_month has_controls" id="month_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="month_link" data-label="Months"></span><h2>Months</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_month">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_month" name="month" href="#month">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_month">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="month" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Months</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">April/March</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">7</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">158</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">138</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">27</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">45</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">6</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">9</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">13</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">27</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">2.08</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.326</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.405</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.565</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.970</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">78</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">7</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">6</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SF">1</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.350</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">128</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">176</td></tr>
<tr data-row="1"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">May</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">56</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">52</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">5</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">13</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">5</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">2</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">2</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">17</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">8.50</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.250</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.286</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.404</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.690</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">21</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">1</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SF">1</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.343</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">62</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">97</td></tr>

<div class="section_heading assoc_month_extra has_controls" id="month_extra_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="month_extra_link" data-label="Months -- Game-Level"></span><h2>Months -- Game-Level</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_month_extra">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_month_extra" name="month_extra" href="#month_extra">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_month_extra">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="month_extra" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Months -- Game-Level</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Wins" data-stat="W" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wins">W</th>
         <th aria-label="Losses" data-stat="L" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Losses">L</th>
         <th aria-label="Win-Loss %" data-stat="win_loss_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Win-Loss Percentage</strong><br>W / (W + L)<br>For players, leaders need one decision for every ten team games.<br>For managers, minimum to qualify for leading is 320 games." data-filter="1" data-name="Win-Loss %">W-L%</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Run Average" data-stat="earned_run_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>9 * ER / IP</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>Bold indicates lowest ERA using current stats<br><span class=glimmer>Gold</span> means awarded ERA title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Earned Run Average">ERA</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Started" data-stat="GS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Started">GS</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Finished" data-stat="GF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Finished">GF</th>
         <th aria-label="Complete Games" data-stat="CG" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Complete Game">CG</th>
         <th aria-label="Shutouts" data-stat="SHO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Shutouts<br>No runs allowed and a complete game.">SHO</th>
         <th aria-label="Saves" data-stat="SV" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Saves">SV</th>
         <th aria-label="Innings Pitched" data-stat="IP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Innings Pitched" data-filter="1" data-name="Innings Pitched">IP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Runs" data-stat="ER" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Earned Runs Allowed">ER</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Balks" data-stat="BK" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Balks">BK</th>
         <th aria-label="Wild Pitches" data-stat="WP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wild Pitches">WP</th>
         <th aria-label="Batters Faced" data-stat="batters_faced" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Batters Faced">BF</th>
         <th aria-label="Walks &amp; Hits per IP" data-stat="whip" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(BB + H)/IP</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Walks &amp; Hits per IP">WHIP</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts per 9 IP" data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>9 x SO / IP</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts per 9 IP">SO9</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">April/March</th><td class="right " data-stat="W">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="L">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="win_loss_perc">.500</td><td class="right " data-stat="earned_run_avg">6.94</td><td class="right " data-stat="G">7</td><td class="right " data-stat="GS">7</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CG">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SHO">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SV">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="IP">35.0</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">45</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">27</td><td class="right " data-stat="ER">27</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">9</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">13</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">27</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">6</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="BK">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="WP">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batters_faced">158</td><td class="right " data-stat="whip">1.657</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine">6.9</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">2.08</td></tr>

         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>

         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>

         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>

         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>

<div class="section_heading assoc_outco_extra" id="outco_extra_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="outco_extra_link" data-label="Game Outcome for Pitcher -- Game-Level"></span><h2>Game Outcome for Pitcher -- Game-Level</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      </ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container" id="div_outco_extra">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table" id="outco_extra" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Game Outcome for Pitcher -- Game-Level</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Wins" data-stat="W" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wins" >W</th>
         <th aria-label="Losses" data-stat="L" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Losses" >L</th>
         <th aria-label="Win-Loss %" data-stat="win_loss_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Win-Loss Percentage&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;W / (W + L)&lt;br&gt;For players, leaders need one decision for every ten team games.&lt;br&gt;For managers, minimum to qualify for leading is 320 games." data-filter="1" data-name="Win-Loss %" >W-L%</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Run Average" data-stat="earned_run_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;9 * ER / IP&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates lowest ERA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=glimmer&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded ERA title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Earned Run Average" >ERA</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Started" data-stat="GS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Started" >GS</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Finished" data-stat="GF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Finished" >GF</th>
         <th aria-label="Complete Games" data-stat="CG" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Complete Game" >CG</th>
         <th aria-label="Shutouts" data-stat="SHO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Shutouts&lt;br&gt;No runs allowed and a complete game." >SHO</th>
         <th aria-label="Saves" data-stat="SV" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Saves" >SV</th>
         <th aria-label="Innings Pitched" data-stat="IP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Innings Pitched" data-filter="1" data-name="Innings Pitched" >IP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Runs" data-stat="ER" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Earned Runs Allowed" >ER</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Balks" data-stat="BK" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Balks" >BK</th>
         <th aria-label="Wild Pitches" data-stat="WP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wild Pitches" >WP</th>
         <th aria-label="Batters Faced" data-stat="batters_faced" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Batters Faced" >BF</th>
         <th aria-label="Walks &amp; Hits per IP" data-stat="whip" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(BB + H)/IP&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Walks &amp; Hits per IP" >WHIP</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts per 9 IP" data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;9 x SO / IP&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts per 9 IP" >SO9</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >in Wins</th><td class="right " data-stat="W" >3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="L" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="win_loss_perc" >1.000</td><td class="right " data-stat="earned_run_avg" >3.32</td><td class="right " data-stat="G" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="GS" >3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CG" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SHO" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SV" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="IP" >19.0</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >17</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >7</td><td class="right " data-stat="ER" >7</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >5</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >13</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="BK" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="WP" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batters_faced" >73</td><td class="right " data-stat="whip" >1.158</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine" >6.2</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >2.60</td></tr>
<tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >in Losses</th><td class="right iz" data-stat="W" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="L" >4</td><td class="right " data-stat="win_loss_perc" >.000</td><td class="right " data-stat="earned_run_avg" >8.82</td><td class="right " data-stat="G" >4</td><td class="right " data-stat="GS" >4</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CG" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SHO" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SV" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="IP" >16.1</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >24</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >17</td><td class="right " data-stat="ER" >16</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR" >6</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >8</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >15</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >4</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="BK" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="WP" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batters_faced" >83</td><td class="right " data-stat="whip" >1.959</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine" >8.3</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >1.88</td></tr>

    </div>

     <div class="section_content" id="div_1484602177">
	    
<div id="all_outco" class="table_wrapper">

<div class="section_heading assoc_outco has_controls" id="outco_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="outco_link" data-label="Game Outcome for Pitcher"></span><h2>Game Outcome for Pitcher</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_outco">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_outco" name="outco" href="#outco">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_outco">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="outco" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Game Outcome for Pitcher</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">in Wins</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">73</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">65</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">7</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">17</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">2</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">5</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">13</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">2.60</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.262</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.343</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.431</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.773</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">28</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">5</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.286</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">83</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">194</td></tr>

<div class="section_heading assoc_outco_extra has_controls" id="outco_extra_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="outco_extra_link" data-label="Game Outcome for Pitcher -- Game-Level"></span><h2>Game Outcome for Pitcher -- Game-Level</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_outco_extra">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_outco_extra" name="outco_extra" href="#outco_extra">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_outco_extra">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="outco_extra" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Game Outcome for Pitcher -- Game-Level</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Wins" data-stat="W" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wins">W</th>
         <th aria-label="Losses" data-stat="L" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Losses">L</th>
         <th aria-label="Win-Loss %" data-stat="win_loss_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Win-Loss Percentage</strong><br>W / (W + L)<br>For players, leaders need one decision for every ten team games.<br>For managers, minimum to qualify for leading is 320 games." data-filter="1" data-name="Win-Loss %">W-L%</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Run Average" data-stat="earned_run_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>9 * ER / IP</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>Bold indicates lowest ERA using current stats<br><span class=glimmer>Gold</span> means awarded ERA title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Earned Run Average">ERA</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Started" data-stat="GS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Started">GS</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Finished" data-stat="GF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Finished">GF</th>
         <th aria-label="Complete Games" data-stat="CG" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Complete Game">CG</th>
         <th aria-label="Shutouts" data-stat="SHO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Shutouts<br>No runs allowed and a complete game.">SHO</th>
         <th aria-label="Saves" data-stat="SV" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Saves">SV</th>
         <th aria-label="Innings Pitched" data-stat="IP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Innings Pitched" data-filter="1" data-name="Innings Pitched">IP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Runs" data-stat="ER" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Earned Runs Allowed">ER</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Balks" data-stat="BK" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Balks">BK</th>
         <th aria-label="Wild Pitches" data-stat="WP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wild Pitches">WP</th>
         <th aria-label="Batters Faced" data-stat="batters_faced" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Batters Faced">BF</th>
         <th aria-label="Walks &amp; Hits per IP" data-stat="whip" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(BB + H)/IP</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Walks &amp; Hits per IP">WHIP</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts per 9 IP" data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>9 x SO / IP</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts per 9 IP">SO9</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">in Wins</th><td class="right " data-stat="W">3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="L">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="win_loss_perc">1.000</td><td class="right " data-stat="earned_run_avg">3.32</td><td class="right " data-stat="G">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="GS">3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CG">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SHO">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SV">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="IP">19.0</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">17</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">7</td><td class="right " data-stat="ER">7</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">5</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">13</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="BK">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="WP">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batters_faced">73</td><td class="right " data-stat="whip">1.158</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine">6.2</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">2.60</td></tr>

     <div class="section_content" id="div_215670928">
	    
<div id="all_sprel" class="table_wrapper">

<div class="section_heading assoc_sprel has_controls" id="sprel_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="sprel_link" data-label="Pitching Role"></span><h2>Pitching Role</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_sprel">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_sprel" name="sprel" href="#sprel">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_sprel">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="sprel" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Pitching Role</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">as Starter</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">248</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">219</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">33</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">63</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">13</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">10</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">5</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS">4</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">18</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">51</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">2.83</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.288</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.363</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.484</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.847</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">106</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">9</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">9</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SF">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.331</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">100</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">134</td></tr>

</tbody></table>
