<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_leado">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="leado" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Leading Off Inning</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">First Batter</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">12</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">10</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="2B">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">1</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SB"></td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS"></td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">3.00</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.300</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.417</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.600</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">1.017</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">6</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GIDP">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">1</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.333</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">139</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">191</td></tr>
<tr data-row="1"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">Leadoff Inn.</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">62</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">58</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">4</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">15</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">4</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SB"></td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS"></td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">14</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">4.67</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.259</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.307</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.500</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.807</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">29</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GIDP">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">1</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.275</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">88</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">127</td></tr>

</tbody></table>


</div>
</div>

            
            
            
         
      
         
            
<div id="all_defpo" class="table_wrapper">

  <span class="section_anchor" id="defpo_link" data-label="Opposition Defensive Position"></span><h2>Opposition Defensive Position</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>

<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_defpo">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="defpo" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Opposition Defensive Position</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">vs. Non-P</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">248</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">219</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">28</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">63</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">13</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">10</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">5</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS">4</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">18</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">51</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">2.83</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.288</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.363</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.484</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.847</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">106</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">9</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">9</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SF">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.331</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">100</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">137</td></tr>

</tbody></table>


</div>
</div>

            
            
            
         
      
         
            
<div id="all_outs" class="table_wrapper">

<div class="section_heading assoc_outs has_controls" id="outs_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="outs_link" data-label="Number of Outs in Inning"></span><h2>Number of Outs in Inning</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_outs">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_outs" name="outs" href="#outs">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>

<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_outs">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="outs" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Number of Outs in Inning</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">0 outs</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">89</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">81</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">6</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">20</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">4</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">6</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">19</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">3.17</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.247</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.315</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.432</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.747</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">35</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.276</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">76</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">107</td></tr>
<tr data-row="1"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">1 out</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">86</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">74</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">11</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">24</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">5</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">2</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">2</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS">1</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">5</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">14</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">2.80</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.324</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.395</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.473</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.868</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">35</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">6</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">5</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SF">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.367</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">107</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">143</td></tr>

<div class="section_heading assoc_bases has_controls" id="bases_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="bases_link" data-label="Bases Occupied"></span><h2>Bases Occupied</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_bases">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_bases" name="bases" href="#bases">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>

<div class="table_container" id="div_bases">

    <caption>Bases Occupied</caption>

         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats" >AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed" >2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed" >3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases" >SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing" >CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>

<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_bases">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="bases" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Bases Occupied</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>

<div class="section_heading assoc_clutc has_controls" id="clutc_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="clutc_link" data-label="Clutch Stats"></span><h2>Clutch Stats</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_clutc">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_clutc" name="clutc" href="#clutc">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div><div class="placeholder"></div>
<!--

<div class="table_container" id="div_clutc">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table" id="clutc" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Clutch Stats</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats" >AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed" >2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed" >3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases" >SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing" >CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954." >SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >2 outs, RISP</th><td class="right " data-stat="G" >12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA" >23</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB" >20</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >5</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >5</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HR" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB" >1</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >1.00</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg" >.250</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc" >.348</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc" >.350</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" >.698</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB" >7</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GIDP" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HBP" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip" >.294</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" >68</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" >95</td></tr>

</div>
<div class="footer no_hide_long" id="tfooter_clutc">

<strong>Late & Close</strong> are Plate Appearances
in the 7th or later with the batting team tied, ahead by one, or the
tying run at least on deck.
</div>-->




<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_clutc">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="clutc" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Clutch Stats</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">2 outs, RISP</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">23</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">20</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">5</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">5</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HR">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">1</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">1.00</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.250</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.348</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.350</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.698</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">7</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GIDP">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HBP">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.294</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">68</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">95</td></tr>

</div>
<div class="footer no_hide_long" id="tfooter_clutc">

<strong>Late &amp; Close</strong> are Plate Appearances
in the 7th or later with the batting team tied, ahead by one, or the
tying run at least on deck.
</div></div>

<div class="section_heading assoc_lever has_controls" id="lever_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="lever_link" data-label="Leverage"></span><h2>Leverage</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul><li><a href="/about/wpa.shtml">About WPA and Leverage</a></li>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_lever">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_lever" name="lever" href="#lever">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div><div class="placeholder"></div>
<!--

<div class="table_container" id="div_lever">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table" id="lever" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Leverage</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats" >AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed" >2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed" >3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases" >SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing" >CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954." >SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >High Lvrge</th><td class="right " data-stat="G" >11</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA" >31</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB" >27</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >5</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >7</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B" >3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HR" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB" >1</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS" >1</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >2</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >7</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >3.50</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg" >.259</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc" >.355</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc" >.370</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" >.725</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB" >10</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP" >5</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip" >.350</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" >74</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" >104</td></tr>
<tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >Medium Lvrge</th><td class="right " data-stat="G" >12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA" >125</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB" >107</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >17</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >30</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B" >6</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR" >6</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >12</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >21</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >1.75</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg" >.280</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc" >.368</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc" >.505</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" >.873</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB" >54</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP" >4</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >4</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SF" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip" >.293</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" >106</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" >142</td></tr>

      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>

         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>

         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>

         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
