  <span class="section_anchor" id="innng_link" data-label="By Inning"></span><h2>By Inning</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_innng">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_innng" name="innng" href="#innng">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>

<div class="table_container" id="div_innng">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table" id="innng" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>By Inning</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Innings Pitched" data-stat="IP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Innings Pitched" data-filter="1" data-name="Innings Pitched" >IP</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Runs" data-stat="ER" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Earned Runs Allowed" >ER</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Run Average" data-stat="earned_run_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;9 * ER / IP&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates lowest ERA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=glimmer&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded ERA title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Earned Run Average" >ERA</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats" >AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed" >2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed" >3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases" >SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing" >CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954." >SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>

</table>


</div>
<div class="footer no_hide_long" id="tfooter_innng">

Runs allowed are credited to the pitcher in the game when the run scored.  Earned Runs are credited to the pitcher who was pitching when the scoring player was at bat.
</div>-->




<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_innng">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="innng" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>By Inning</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Innings Pitched" data-stat="IP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Innings Pitched" data-filter="1" data-name="Innings Pitched">IP</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Runs" data-stat="ER" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Earned Runs Allowed">ER</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Run Average" data-stat="earned_run_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>9 * ER / IP</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>Bold indicates lowest ERA using current stats<br><span class=glimmer>Gold</span> means awarded ERA title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Earned Run Average">ERA</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>

</tbody></table>


</div>
<div class="footer no_hide_long" id="tfooter_innng">

Runs allowed are credited to the pitcher in the game when the run scored.  Earned Runs are credited to the pitcher who was pitching when the scoring player was at bat.
</div></div>

  <span class="section_anchor" id="times_link" data-label="Times Facing Opponent in Game"></span><h2>Times Facing Opponent in Game</h2>

<div class="table_container" id="div_times">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table" id="times" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Times Facing Opponent in Game</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats" >AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed" >2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed" >3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases" >SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing" >CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954." >SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >1st PA in G, as SP</th><td class="right " data-stat="G" >12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA" >107</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB" >94</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >11</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >28</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B" >4</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR" >5</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SB" ></td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS" ></td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >9</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >24</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >2.67</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg" >.298</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc" >.383</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc" >.500</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" >.883</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB" >47</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP" >4</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >4</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip" >.354</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" >109</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" >153</td></tr>
<tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >2nd PA in G, as SP</th><td class="right " data-stat="G" >12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA" >99</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB" >89</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >14</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >25</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B" >7</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR" >5</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SB" ></td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS" ></td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >6</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >18</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >3.00</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg" >.281</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc" >.333</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc" >.528</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" >.861</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB" >47</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP" >2</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SF" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip" >.294</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" >101</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" >134</td></tr>
<tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >3rd PA in G, as SP</th><td class="right " data-stat="G" >8</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA" >38</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB" >32</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >9</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HR" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SB" ></td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS" ></td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >8</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >2.67</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg" >.281</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc" >.395</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc" >.344</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" >.739</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB" >11</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip" >.375</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" >80</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" >99</td></tr>

</table>


</div>
-->




<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_times">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="times" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Times Facing Opponent in Game</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">1st PA in G, as SP</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">107</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">94</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">11</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">28</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">4</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">5</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SB"></td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS"></td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">9</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">24</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">2.67</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.298</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.383</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.500</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.883</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">47</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">4</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">4</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.354</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">109</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">153</td></tr>
<tr data-row="1"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">2nd PA in G, as SP</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">99</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">89</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">14</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">25</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">7</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">5</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SB"></td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS"></td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">6</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">18</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">3.00</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.281</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.333</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.528</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.861</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">47</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">2</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SF">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.294</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">101</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">134</td></tr>

<div class="section_heading assoc_pitco has_controls" id="pitco_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="pitco_link" data-label="Pitch Count"></span><h2>Pitch Count</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul><li><a href="/about/pitch_data.shtml">Pitch Data</a> is for 1988 on</li>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_pitco">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_pitco" name="pitco" href="#pitco">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>

<div class="table_container" id="div_pitco">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table" id="pitco" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Pitch Count</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>

      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>

         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954." >SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >Pitch 1-25</th><td class="right " data-stat="G" >12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA" >71</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB" >61</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >9</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >19</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B" >3</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR" >4</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SB" ></td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS" ></td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >6</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >16</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >2.67</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg" >.312</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc" >.409</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc" >.557</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" >.966</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB" >34</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP" >4</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >4</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip" >.366</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" >128</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" >173</td></tr>

<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_pitco">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="pitco" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Pitch Count</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>

<div class="section_heading assoc_dr" id="dr_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="dr_link" data-label="Days of Rest"></span><h2>Days of Rest</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>

<div class="table_container" id="div_dr">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table" id="dr" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Days of Rest</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats" >AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed" >2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed" >3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases" >SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing" >CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954." >SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >4 Days,GS</th><td class="right " data-stat="G" >4</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA" >84</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB" >79</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >11</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >23</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B" >8</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR" >5</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO" >25</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" >8.33</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg" >.291</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc" >.333</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc" >.582</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" >.916</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB" >46</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP" >3</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip" >.367</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" >112</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" >148</td></tr>

     <div class="section_content" id="div_7873812158">

<div class="section_heading assoc_dr has_controls" id="dr_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="dr_link" data-label="Days of Rest"></span><h2>Days of Rest</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_dr">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_dr" name="dr" href="#dr">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_dr">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="dr" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Days of Rest</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">4 Days,GS</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">4</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">84</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">79</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">11</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">23</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">8</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR">5</td><td class="right " data-stat="SB">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="CS">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="BB">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="SO">25</td><td class="right " data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls">8.33</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.291</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.333</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.582</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.916</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">46</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">3</td><td class="right " data-stat="HBP">2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.367</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">112</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">148</td></tr>

  <span class="section_anchor" id="dr_extra_link" data-label="Days of Rest -- Game-Level"></span><h2>Days of Rest -- Game-Level</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_dr_extra">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_dr_extra" name="dr_extra" href="#dr_extra">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>

         <th aria-label="Earned Run Average" data-stat="earned_run_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>9 * ER / IP</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>Bold indicates lowest ERA using current stats<br><span class=glimmer>Gold</span> means awarded ERA title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Earned Run Average">ERA</th>

         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>

      </tr>
      </thead>
