<div class="section_heading assoc_hitlo has_controls" id="hitlo_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="hitlo_link" data-label="Hit Location"></span><h2>Hit Location</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul><li><a href="/about/hit_type_location.shtml">Hit Data</a> is for 1988 on</li>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_hitlo">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_hitlo" name="hitlo" href="#hitlo">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div><div class="placeholder"></div>
<!--

<div class="table_container" id="div_hitlo">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table" id="hitlo" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Hit Location</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats" >AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed" >2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed" >3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases" >SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing" >CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954." >SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>

<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_hitlo">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="hitlo" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Hit Location</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>

<div class="section_heading assoc_traj has_controls" id="traj_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="traj_link" data-label="Hit Trajectory"></span><h2>Hit Trajectory</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul><li><a href="/about/hit_type_location.shtml">Hit Data</a> is for 1988 on</li>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_traj">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_traj" name="traj" href="#traj">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>

<!--

<div class="table_container" id="div_traj">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table" id="traj" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Hit Trajectory</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats" >AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed" >2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed" >3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases" >SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing" >CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954." >SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >Ground Balls</th><td class="right " data-stat="G" >12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA" >72</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB" >72</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >5</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >19</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B" >4</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HR" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="BB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SO" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" ></td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg" >.264</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc" >.264</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc" >.319</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" >.583</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB" >23</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP" >9</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HBP" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip" >.264</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" >39</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" >126</td></tr>
<tr ><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name" >Fly Balls</th><td class="right " data-stat="G" >12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA" >55</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB" >53</td><td class="right " data-stat="R" >17</td><td class="right " data-stat="H" >17</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="HR" >10</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="BB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SO" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" ></td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg" >.321</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc" >.309</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc" >.925</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" >1.234</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB" >49</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="GIDP" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HBP" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="SF" >2</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB" >0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE" >0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip" >.156</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" >176</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" >203</td></tr>

<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_traj">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="traj" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Hit Trajectory</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>
<tbody><tr data-row="0"><th scope="row" class="left " data-stat="split_name">Ground Balls</th><td class="right " data-stat="G">12</td><td class="right " data-stat="PA">72</td><td class="right " data-stat="AB">72</td><td class="right " data-stat="R">5</td><td class="right " data-stat="H">19</td><td class="right " data-stat="2B">4</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="3B">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HR">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="CS">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="BB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SO">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls"></td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg">.264</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_perc">.264</td><td class="right " data-stat="slugging_perc">.319</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging">.583</td><td class="right " data-stat="TB">23</td><td class="right " data-stat="GIDP">9</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="HBP">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SH">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="SF">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="IBB">0</td><td class="right iz" data-stat="ROE">0</td><td class="right " data-stat="batting_avg_bip">.264</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total">39</td><td class="right " data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg">126</td></tr>

         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>

         <th aria-label="Losses" data-stat="L" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Losses" >L</th>
         <th aria-label="Win-Loss %" data-stat="win_loss_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Win-Loss Percentage&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;W / (W + L)&lt;br&gt;For players, leaders need one decision for every ten team games.&lt;br&gt;For managers, minimum to qualify for leading is 320 games." data-filter="1" data-name="Win-Loss %" >W-L%</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Run Average" data-stat="earned_run_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;9 * ER / IP&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates lowest ERA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=glimmer&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded ERA title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Earned Run Average" >ERA</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Started" data-stat="GS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Started" >GS</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Finished" data-stat="GF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Finished" >GF</th>
         <th aria-label="Complete Games" data-stat="CG" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Complete Game" >CG</th>
         <th aria-label="Shutouts" data-stat="SHO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Shutouts&lt;br&gt;No runs allowed and a complete game." >SHO</th>
         <th aria-label="Saves" data-stat="SV" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Saves" >SV</th>
         <th aria-label="Innings Pitched" data-stat="IP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Innings Pitched" data-filter="1" data-name="Innings Pitched" >IP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Earned Runs" data-stat="ER" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Earned Runs Allowed" >ER</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Balks" data-stat="BK" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Balks" >BK</th>
         <th aria-label="Wild Pitches" data-stat="WP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Wild Pitches" >WP</th>
         <th aria-label="Batters Faced" data-stat="batters_faced" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Batters Faced" >BF</th>
         <th aria-label="Walks &amp; Hits per IP" data-stat="whip" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(BB + H)/IP&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Walks &amp; Hits per IP" >WHIP</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts per 9 IP" data-stat="strikeouts_per_nine" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;9 x SO / IP&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts per 9 IP" >SO9</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
      </tr>

     <div class="section_content" id="div_6853834672">
	    
<div id="all_oppon" class="table_wrapper">

<div class="section_heading assoc_oppon has_controls" id="oppon_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="oppon_link" data-label="Opponent"></span><h2>Opponent</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_oppon">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_oppon" name="oppon" href="#oppon">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_oppon">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="oppon" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Opponent</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>

  <span class="section_anchor" id="oppon_extra_link" data-label="Opponent -- Game-Level"></span><h2>Opponent -- Game-Level</h2>

      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_oppon_extra">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_oppon_extra" name="oppon_extra" href="#oppon_extra">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>

         <th aria-label="Earned Run Average" data-stat="earned_run_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>9 * ER / IP</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>Bold indicates lowest ERA using current stats<br><span class=glimmer>Gold</span> means awarded ERA title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Earned Run Average">ERA</th>

<div class="table_container" id="div_stad">

      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats" >AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed" >2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed" >3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases" >SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing" >CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954." >SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Intentional Bases on Balls&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1955." >IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>

  <span class="section_anchor" id="stad_extra_link" data-label="Game Conditions -- Game-Level"></span><h2>Game Conditions -- Game-Level</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      </ul>
    </div>

         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left" >Split</th>

     <div class="section_content" id="div_2424785089">

<div class="section_heading assoc_stad has_controls" id="stad_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="stad_link" data-label="Game Conditions"></span><h2>Game Conditions</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_stad">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_stad" name="stad" href="#stad">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>
    </div>
    		
</div>
<div class="table_container is_setup" id="div_stad">
    
    <table class="row_summable sortable stats_table now_sortable" id="stad" data-cols-to-freeze=",1">
    <caption>Game Conditions</caption>
    

   <colgroup><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col><col></colgroup>
   <thead>      
      <tr>
         <th aria-label="Split" data-stat="split_name" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc left">Split</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched">G</th>
         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA.">PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats">AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed">R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed">H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed">2B</th>
         <th aria-label="Triples" data-stat="3B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Triples Hit/Allowed">3B</th>
         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed">HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks">BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts">SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>SO/W or SO/BB</strong><br>For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP<br>per team game played.<br>No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls">SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;>Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average">BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%">OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %">SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging">OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" data-stat="SF" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
         <th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" data-stat="IBB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Reached On Error</strong><br>Times a batter reached due to an error<br>DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded.">ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays</strong>(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)<br>This also measures how effectively the<br>defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play">BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split.">tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS</strong><br>A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.<br>A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.<br>League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.<br>sOPS+ is not park-adjusted.">sOPS+</th>
      </tr>
      </thead>

<div class="section_heading assoc_stad_extra has_controls" id="stad_extra_sh">
  <span class="section_anchor" id="stad_extra_link" data-label="Game Conditions -- Game-Level"></span><h2>Game Conditions -- Game-Level</h2>
      <div class="section_heading_text">
      <ul>
      <li class="hasmore"><span>Share &amp; Export</span><div><ul><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Use a customizable report creator that can<br>output HTML, CSV, or a shareable link." type="button" id="share_on_stad_extra">Modify, Export &amp; Share Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Convert the table below to comma-separated values<br>suitable for use with Excel" type="button">Get as Excel Workbook</button><a id="dlink" style="display: none;"></a></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Get a link directly to this table on this page" type="button">Get table as CSV (for Excel)</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button" id="a_stad_extra" name="stad_extra" href="#stad_extra">Get Link to Table</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button">About Sharing Tools</button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWapXbaWs_U&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: SR Sharing Tools &amp; How-to</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkDLV0roT14&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Video: Stats Table Tips &amp; Tricks</a></button></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="" type="button"><a href="https://www.sports-reference.com/data_use.html" target="_blank">Data Usage Terms</a></button></li></ul></div></li><li><button class="tooltip" tip="Show a glossary for each term in the table below<br>or hold your mouse over the header" type="button">Glossary</button></li></ul>

         <th aria-label="Plate Appearances" data-stat="PA" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Plate Appearances&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts&lt;br&gt;Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,&lt;br&gt;which excludes catcher interferences.&lt;br&gt;When &lt;span class=tooltip&gt;this color&lt;/span&gt; click for a summary of each PA." >PA</th>
         <th aria-label="At Bats" data-stat="AB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="At Bats" >AB</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Scored" data-stat="R" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" >R</th>
         <th aria-label="Hits" data-stat="H" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" >H</th>
         <th aria-label="Doubles" data-stat="2B" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Doubles Hit/Allowed" >2B</th>

         <th aria-label="Home Runs" data-stat="HR" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" >HR</th>
         <th aria-label="Stolen Bases" data-stat="SB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Stolen Bases" >SB</th>
         <th aria-label="Caught Stealing" data-stat="CS" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Caught Stealing" >CS</th>
         <th aria-label="Bases on Balls" data-stat="BB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" >BB</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts" data-stat="SO" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Strikeouts" >SO</th>
         <th aria-label="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" data-stat="strikeouts_per_base_on_balls" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;SO/W or SO/BB&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, pitching leaders need 1 IP&lt;br&gt;per team game played.&lt;br&gt;No batting leaders computed." data-filter="1" data-name="Strikeouts / Base On Balls" >SO/W</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Hits/At Bats&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played&lt;br&gt;Bold indicates highest BA using current stats&lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;all_time_record&quot;&gt;Gold&lt;/span&gt; means awarded title at end of year." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" >BA</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" >OBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" >SLG</th>
         <th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;On-Base + Slugging Percentages &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA&lt;br&gt;per team game played" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" >OPS</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Bases" data-stat="TB" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Total Bases&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." >TB</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" data-stat="GIDP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Double Plays Grounded Into&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.&lt;br&gt;First tracked in 1933.&lt;br&gt;For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.&lt;br&gt;All official seasonal totals do not include GITP&#39;s." >GDP</th>
         <th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" data-stat="HBP" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." >HBP</th>
         <th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" data-stat="SH" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" >SH</th>

         <th aria-label="ROE" data-stat="ROE" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Reached On Error&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;Times a batter reached due to an error&lt;br&gt;DOES NOT include a fielder&amp;#x2019;s choice where no out was recorded." >ROE</th>
         <th aria-label="Batting Average on Balls In Play" data-stat="batting_avg_bip" scope="col" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;Batting Avg. on Balls in Plays&lt;/strong&gt;(Hits - Home Runs)/(At Bats - SO - HR + Sac Flies)&lt;br&gt;This also measures how effectively the&lt;br&gt;defense turned balls into outs." data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average on Balls In Play" >BAbip</th>
         <th aria-label="tOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_total" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to Player&amp;#x2019;s Total OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than usual in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than usual in this split." >tOPS+</th>
         <th aria-label="sOPS+" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_vs_lg" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="&lt;strong&gt;OPS for split relative to League&amp;#x2019;s Split OPS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;A number greater than 100 indicates this batter(pitcher) did better(worse) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;A number less than 100 indicates that the batter(pitcher) did worse(better) than the league in this split.&lt;br&gt;League averages are for the major leagues as a whole and include pitchers&amp;#x2019; batting.&lt;br&gt;sOPS+ is not park-adjusted." >sOPS+</th>
